    • Method Detail

      • createRental

        public Rental createRental(java.lang.Long userId,
                           Rental rental)

        Method for getting the price on a rental. This method will calculate the price for the rental request based on the business requirements.

        Specified by:
        createRental in interface RentalService
        Parameters:
        userId - of the user requesting the rental.
        rental - object with the data of the request.
        Returns:
        Rental object that was persisted in the data base.
        Throws:
        InvalidDateException - if the requested date of the booking is before today.
        UserDoesNotExistsException - if the user does not exist in the system.

      • getAllRentals

        public RentalList getAllRentals()

        Method for retrieving all existing rentals.

        Specified by:
        getAllRentals in interface RentalService
        Returns:
        RentalList containing all rentals created.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • removeRental

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
